name: if you could love a wolf like me...
name_original: if you could love a wolf like me...
description:
Before I knew about this place, I labelled these audio-files.

But when I numbered them I accidentally left out the tenth audio file. It goes from nine to eleven and up from there. I'm still not sure where that file is or what's in it...

There’s this mental block. I didn’t pull myself out of this place because I think i can’t or because i think i shouldn’t . 

I feel so embarrassed that I’m still doing this. Talking about this. But I never did it before. I couldn’t grieve before because a person can’t grieve if they can’t feel the pain they think they deserve.

I don’t want to lose these feelings or memories because once they are gone that is it. I won’t be able to go back there again, because if I do it right this time I will open my eyes and be somewhere else.

Maybe I need to go back to that city where this started....to find the place I can’t seem to leave--
